channel.title: Why Is It Taking So Long For Me To Recieve the Results of this ban Appeal?
channel.description:
[img]http://img152.imageshack.us/img152/8950/banea0.png[/img]
Why Is It Taking So Long For Me To Recieve the Results of this ban Appeal...?? Ussualy they reply with a DENIED within 2 days, but now it has been well over a week.... Lol... Any Ideas?

item.title: Why Is It Taking So Long For Me To Recieve the Results of this ban Appeal?
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

They also said that they would not do it without proper reason. Nice bump, fucktard.

Read full topic
item.source: Why Is It Taking So Long For Me To Recieve the Results of this ban Appeal?

item.title: Why Is It Taking So Long For Me To Recieve the Results of this ban Appeal?
item.dc:creator: @quest_rs quest rs
item.description:
@quest_rs wrote:

[quote=“buckleyindahouse, post:64, topic:30464”][quote author=deoxys505 link=topic=44583.msg590165#msg590165 date=1165654244]

I heard from somewhere but i forgot, that they delete your account from the game once u hit more then 10 blackmarks. So get started on another character.

they dont delete accounts…if they deleted an account whos ban was unfair someone could sue the crap outa them…we’re talking lifetime membership and they could make false statements about what they had on the account to get more…so lifetime membership and a cracker or 10 and p-hats…it would be bad for jagex…and it would leave a bad image
[/quote] Hmm, so I still have a chance to get my main back but its taking forever…[/quote]

Umm… the last time I read about the banning, I recall something about Jagex having the right to ban/mute/delete items or rape it in any other way possible without even having a legit reason. Because they clarly stated in thier agreement that your “account” is a “property of JaGEx”

Read full topic

item.title: Why Is It Taking So Long For Me To Recieve the Results of this ban Appeal?
item.dc:creator: @deoxys505 deoxys505
item.description:
@deoxys505 wrote:

yeah …i would recommend that you appeal it soon buckleyindahouse…if not it may not happen…or you can always call customer support…[br][size=1]Posted at: December 09, 2006, 12:05:53 PM[/size][hr]go here:http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,48487.0.html

might help some of why your not getting unbanned

Read full topic

@deoxys505 wrote:

i wanst banned permanently just for 3 days…luckly…but what items are on those accounts…you should do it then sell them on ebay or give them items away for money…if you got p-hats then i would love one…white red or blue but any color is what im after…even a cracker…but im not begging for you to do that…

item.title: Why Is It Taking So Long For Me To Recieve the Results of this ban Appeal?
item.dc:creator: @not2good not2good
item.description:
@not2good wrote:

[quote=“Hex Key, post:47, topic:30464”]You could always trying ringing Jagex ban department:

Ask for either of the 2 below at reception then plead your case.
Or ask for a lower member of ban support offer to give them monies to unban you. (low level ban staff wil be up for bribes for sure)

Head of Customer Relations - Kelvin P

Snapshot Ban Appeal Team Unit Leader - Daniel H

Tele: 01223 503 861
Tele2: 01223 535 185
Fax: 01223 515 212
11 Sturton Street, Cambridge, CB1 2SN, UK

In your case its probably not worth it, but i have banned characters with 500Mill+ of items.[/quote]
Well doesn’t that suck for you?

Read full topic
